name: manual-full-sync
description: Manually trigger a full documentation sync

action.prompt:
Perform a full documentation sync:

1. Analyze all source files in src/ for APIs, classes, and functions
2. Update .kiro/specs/api.md with current API documentation
3. Update README.md with current features and usage
4. Create a development log entry in .kiro/development-log/
5. Report what was updated
